catalogItem.description:
Create a Release Pipeline with CI/CD Pipeline for the DDI continuous integration. Create a Release Pipeline with QA, Staging and Production stages with approval gates to manage path to production from QA to Production deployment including Test Automation. After creating a new Pipeline using this template, please look at description of each tasks by clicking on the 'i' icon in the task list for a stage. Each task description has pointers on how to set up that task.

]]>

Create a pipeline for the DDI continuous integration.

Create a new Pipeline for the DDI continuous integration. After creating a new Pipeline using this template, please look at description of each tasks by clicking on the 'i' icon in the task list for a stage. Each task description has pointers on how to set up that task.

]]>

Create a pipeline for the DDI continuous delivery. Create a Pipeline with QA, Staging and Production stages with approval gates to manage path to production from QA to Production deployment including Test Automation. After creating a new Pipeline using this template, please look at description of each tasks by clicking on the 'i' icon in the task list for a stage. Each task description has pointers on how to set up that task.

]]>
